module.name: Voicemail Notifications
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php. You can configure a new Voicemail Notification to monitor a mailbox for new messages. When a new message is left in that mailbox the system will call the recipients listed below until one of them accepts responsibility for the message. All numbers in the first priority will be called simultaneously, then if nobody has accepted the message it will continue to call all recipients in the next higher priority until it runs out of priorities to call. It will then retry the entire list if configured to do so.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.3* Sales cleanup *2.11.0.0* Bump for 2.11 *2.10.0.24* Fix vmnotify when emailing attachment *2.10.0.23* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.23 *2.10.0.22* Packaging of ver 2.10.0.22 *2.10.0.21* Put externnotify in voicemail.conf instead of vm_general.inc *2.10.0.20* fix php tag *2.10.0.19* re #1263 - re #1263
